channel.title: xEpicz v2.5
channel.description:
[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/6290/ehee.gif[/img] [b] xEpicz[/b] [font=verdana][size=13px]I'm starting off tomorrow. This source is called xEpicz, based off[b] iClarity[/b], a [b]317 [/b]loading [b]459[/b] gameframe with custom interfaces. At first this was an RS 2006 remake. Since I couldn't finish it, I decide to release it. Now I'm attempting to add more features to it, few more skills, fix some bugs, quests and stuff. At the moment, I'm the only one working on this project. I'll attempt to make it way better, I'll only work on the skills and quests though, since the combat is perfect. If you think I've been working on way too many projects, just fuck off. I haven't been coding RSPS's for like 2 months, so I'm getting back, to give to the community something sexy to use.[/size][/font][code]public void process() { if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - Update) > 200) { Update = System.currentTimeMillis(); processTimers(); } if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - Update) > 200) { animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis(); processTimers(); } } [/code][font=verdana][size=13px]
I'm continuing this project using my first xEpicz release: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514973.msg3738990.html#msg3738990]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514973.msg3738990.html#msg3738990[/url]
Project goals: [/size][/font] [ul][li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]Herblore[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]Agility[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]Witch's potion[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]Cook's assistant[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]RuneCrafting[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]Fishing[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li][font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=13px]WoodCutting[/size][/font][/font][/li] [li]Fun minigame with reward[/li][/ul] [code] Improving Herblore Attempting to finish the minigame [/code][font=verdana][size=13px]
Pictures: [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/5372/tutorialisland.png[/img] [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/700/pickpocketing.png[/img][img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/2246/fillingvials.png[/img][img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/3658/fletching.png[/img][img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6645/dbaxespecial.png[/img][img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/6356/jadwithwaves.png[/img] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/3629/perfectddsblitz.png[/img] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/3799/barrowsin.png[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/5310/firemakingt.png[/img] [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/2749/lampv.png[/img][/size][/font]

item.title: xEpicz v2.5
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:12, topic:423872”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=526525.msg3835586#msg3835586 date=1322875308]

[quote author=judostar1 link=topic=526525.msg3835580#msg3835580 date=1322875138]

zomfg, you actually started on it, :OOOOOO
[/quote]Yeah im back

All i can say is when I used your v1, i felt like i was playing rs back in 05

Nice to know brah.

God luck with this, link me when you release for testing I always have loved iclarity.

I’m sure I will, iClarity is a great source to use, major of half of them released and a great base to use. Can improve your skilling knowledge alot, and fun to use since it’s quite easy when you learn how to use it.
[/quote]^ I meant to say Good luck not god luck sorry for my fail typing :([/quote]
lol shit happens

Read full topic

                                                                                     [b] xEpicz[/b]

[font=verdana][size=13px]I’m starting off tomorrow. This source is called xEpicz, based off iClarity, a 317 loading 459 gameframe with custom interfaces. At first this was an RS 2006 remake. If you think I’ve been working on way too many projects, just fuck off.
